title: Project Management UI

detailed_design.description: Add New project and basic project CRUD in sidebar. Backend has POST/PATCH /api/projects but frontend has no UI to create or edit projects.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add createProject and patchProject to api-client. 2. Add New project button in Chats tab of AppSidebar. 3. Create project modal/dialog (name, optional color). 4. Edit project via context menu or inline (rename, change colour). 5. Wire onNewProject, onPatchProject callbacks from page.tsx; refresh projects list after create/update.

acceptance_criteria: New project button in Chats tab of app-sidebar.tsx
Edit project (rename, change color) via context menu or inline

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to create a new project from the sidebar.
As a user, I want to rename or change the colour of a project.
As a user, I want new conversations to be assignable to the right project.

technical_notes.current_issue: Backend has project CRUD; frontend has no New project or edit UI
